name: Recron® Fiberfill AirTherm
description: Discover Recron® AirTherm, a multi-faceted innovative product combining warmth, comfort, durability and sustainability - all into a single entity. It enables outstanding ‘Ball and Wadding Insulation' in modern clothing - thermal wear and jackets; and sleep solutions — comforters, quilts, sleeping bags, that provide exceptional TOG/ CLO value, 10-15% higher over conventional solid fine fibres.Say goodbye to heavy winter wear and quilts!Product Attributes:A ‘downright’ blend of warmth and lightness for Thermal Wears and sleep solutionsOutstanding Ball and Wadding Insulation to jackets/quilts,Higher TOG/CLO value by 10-15% over conventional solid fine fibersMore warmth with less weight; thanks to it's >16% hollowness10-15% better 'Softness Index' than that of traditional fiberfill,Made from Pre-Consumer wasteGRS and OEKO-Tex Certified.Special Name: Recron® AirThermDenier Range:  1.8Cut Length:   51,64,76Speciality:  Siliconised
